verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> reigns; <S%H4427><s%> let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice; <S%H1523><s%> Let the many <S%H7227><s%> islands <S%H339><s%> be glad. <S%H8055><s%>

Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and thick <S%H6205><s%> darkness <S%H6205><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> Him; Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> are the foundation <S%H4349><s%> of His throne. <S%H3678><s%>
Fire <S%H784><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him, And burns <S%H3857><s%> up His adversaries <S%H6862><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about. <S%H5439><s%>
His lightnings <S%H1300><s%> lit <S%H215><s%> up the world; <S%H8398><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> and trembled. <S%H9123><s%>

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> melted <S%H4549><s%> like wax <S%H1749><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> At the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> His righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> His glory. <S%H9202><s%>

Let all <S%H3605><s%> those be ashamed <S%H954><s%> who serve <S%H5647><s%> graven <S%H6459><s%> images, <S%H6459><s%> Who boast <S%H1984><s%> themselves of idols; <S%H457><s%> Worship <S%H7812><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> you gods. <S%H430><s%>

Zion <S%H6726><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [this] and was glad, <S%H8055><s%> And the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have rejoiced <S%H1523><s%> Because <S%H4616><s%> of Thy judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

For Thou art the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Most <S%H5945><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> Thou art exalted <S%H5927><s%> far <S%H3966><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

Hate <S%H8130><s%> evil, <S%H9563><s%> you who love <S%H157><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who preserves <S%H8104><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones; <S%H2623><s%> He delivers <S%H5337><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Light <S%H216><s%> is sown <S%H2232><s%> [like seed] for the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> And gladness <S%H8057><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> you righteous <S%H6662><s%> ones; <S%H6662><s%> And give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to His holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H2143><s%>
